nodes.text: Amit Noloff was a male Quarren who was a prominent leader on Iego during the Clone Wars.

Noloff was a firm believer in the planet's superstition about "Drol", and warned Generals Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi not to attempt to leave the planet due to the "ghost's curse". Skywalker and Kenobi successfully identified the so-called curse as a Separatist defense system and navigated their way through. Arrogantly, Noloff refused to believe the Jedi. Still firm in his beliefs, Noloff expressed dismay upon hearing that the Jedi had successfully left the planet even as others cheered around him.

Amit was firm believer in the curse of Iego and tried to talk Anakin and Obi-Wan out of trying to leave the planet. Since he was a prominent leader on Iego, he must have been a good speaker to convince the other trapped spacers of his ideas.

Amit Noloff was voiced by Phil LaMarr.
His mouth differed from other Quarren's mouths.
